title: The Evolving Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/20/20
itunes:title: The Evolving Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/20/20
description:
George Noory and psychologist Dr. Linda Backman explore her research into past lives and reincarnation, and how the human soul continues to evolve to reach perfection.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
